item.description:
Hi, Everybody:

Normally, I scout out a place before leading a hike, but this time we'll wing it and see where it goes!  Should be fun with a lot of flowers and trees in full bloom!  Just click on the link above and that in turn will lead to the Maudslay web page.  Pack along a big picnic lunch and beverages and we'll find a place to stop on the trail.

Since we'll be winging it, I can only generalize on the time frame - just allow several hours to enjoy the day and hike.

The park charges a $2.00 entrance fee.  Bring along single dollar bills and quarters for the ticket machine then just leave the ticket on the dashboard of your vehicle.

Any questions, just let me know.

Randy
item.how_to_find_us: Look for silver Subaru Forester in parking lot

group.name: North Shore Not Too Intense Hikers

item.name: Winging it at Maudslay - with picnic lunch!
